cycling

Class Checkpoint

  • java.lang.Object
    • cycling.Entity
      • cycling.Checkpoint
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Climb, IntermediateSprint

    class Checkpoint
extends Entity
    Abstract class for a checkpoint. This class is the superclass for the subclasses IntermediateSprint and Climb
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    730003140, 730002704

    • Constructor Detail

      • Checkpoint

        protected Checkpoint(CheckpointType type,
                     java.lang.Double location,
                     Stage parentStage)
              throws InvalidLocationException,
                     InvalidStageTypeException,
                     InvalidStageStateException
        Constructor for the abstract superclass checkpoint. This will be called via super() in the subclasses
        Parameters:
        type - the type of checkpoint
        location - the location of the checkpoint
        parentStage - the stage that the checkpoint is in
        Throws:
        InvalidLocationException - if the location is out of range of the stage
        InvalidStageTypeException - if the stage is not of the correct type
        InvalidStageStateException - if the stage is already prepared
